files.content:
data class Menu(
    val name: String,
    val description: String,
    val price: Double,
    val photo: String
)

import androidx.room.Entity
import androidx.room.PrimaryKey
import com.example.牛太郎餐厅.model.Menu

@Entity(tableName = "menu")
data class MenuEntity(
    @PrimaryKey(autoGenerate = true)
    val id: Int,
    val name: String,
    val description: String,
    val price: Double,
    val photo: String
)

import android.os.Bundle
import android.view.LayoutInflater
import android.view.View
import android.view.ViewGroup
import android.widget.Button
import android.widget.EditText
import android.widget.ImageView
import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
import com.bumptech.glide.Glide
import com.example.牛太郎餐厅.model.Menu

class EditFragment : Fragment() {
    override fun onCreateView(inflater: LayoutInflater, container: ViewGroup?, savedInstanceState: Bundle?): View? {
        val view = inflater.inflate(R.layout.fragment_edit, container, false)

        val nameEditText = view.findViewById<EditText>(R.id.name_edit_text)
        val descriptionEditText = view.findViewById<EditText>(R.id.description_edit_text)
        val priceEditText = view.findViewById<EditText>(R.id.price_edit_text)
        val photoImageView = view.findViewById<ImageView>(R.id.photo_image_view)

        val button = view.findViewById<Button>(R.id.button)
        button.setOnClickListener {
            val menu = Menu(nameEditText.text.toString(), descriptionEditText.text.toString(), priceEditText.text.toString().toDouble(), photoImageView.drawable.toString())
            MenuService(context).addMenu(menu)
            val intent = Intent(context, MainActivity::class.java)
            startActivity(intent)
        }

        return view
    }
}

import android.os.Bundle
import android.view.LayoutInflater

import android.widget.Button

import android.widget.ImageView
import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
import com.bumptech.glide.Glide
import com.example.牛太郎餐厅.model.Menu

class UploadFragment : Fragment() {
    override fun onCreateView(inflater: LayoutInflater, container: ViewGroup?, savedInstanceState: Bundle?): View? {
        val view = inflater.inflate(R.layout.fragment_upload, container, false)

        val nameEditText = view.findViewById<EditText>(R.id.name_edit_text)
        val descriptionEditText = view.findViewById<EditText>(R.id.description_edit_text)
        val priceEditText = view.findViewById<EditText>(R.id.price_edit_text)
        val photoImageView = view.findViewById<ImageView>(R.id.photo_image_view)

        val button = view.findViewById<Button>(R.id.button)
        button.setOnClickListener {
            val menu = Menu(nameEditText.text.toString(), descriptionEditText.text.toString(), priceEditText.text.toString().toDouble(), photoImageView.drawable.toString())
            MenuService(context).addMenu(menu)
            val intent = Intent(context, MainActivity::class.java)
            startActivity(intent)
        }

        return view
    }
}

import android.os.Bundle
import android.view.LayoutInflater
import android.view.View
import android.view.ViewGroup
import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
import androidx.fragment.app.FragmentManager
import androidx.fragment.app.FragmentTransaction
import com.example.牛太郎餐厅.fragment.MenuFragment
import com.example.牛太郎餐厅.fragment.EditFragment
import com.example.牛太郎餐厅.fragment.CommentFragment
import com.example.牛太郎餐厅.fragment.LikeFragment
import com.example.牛太郎餐厅.fragment.UploadFragment

class MainActivity : AppCompatActivity() {
    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
        setContentView(R.layout.activity_main)

        val fragmentManager = supportFragmentManager
        val fragmentTransaction = fragmentManager.beginTransaction()

        val menuFragment = MenuFragment()
        fragmentTransaction.add(R.id.fragment_container, menuFragment)
        fragmentTransaction.commit()
    }
}
